Articles.Content: Does anyone else here play this? I saw an ad(not really a ad, but you get what I mean) through steam, download it and so far it was very fun.

I don't have JC2 on steam.

What I don't like about it is that since it's only available on steam, EVERYONE who bought it from the actual site and not steam can't download.

I don't have JC2 on steam.

What I don't like about it is that since it's only available on steam, EVERYONE who bought it from the actual site and not steam can't download.

IIRC I got a boxed copy of JC2, and it installed as a steam version.
950+ people on a server.....its crazy.....crazy fun.
